statements: SELECT * FROM user_progress ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT session_id, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT user_id, total_time_spent FROM user_progress WHERE completed_tasks < 10;
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, completed_tasks, total_time_spent FROM user_progress WHERE session_id = 7 ORDER BY completed_tasks ASC, total_time_spent DESC;
SELECT user_id, progress_percentage, completed_tasks FROM user_progress WHERE session_id = 123 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC
SELECT user_id, total_time_spent, completed_tasks FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50
SELECT user_id, total_time_spent, progress_percentage FROM user_progress WHERE completed_tasks = 10 ORDER BY total_time_spent ASC
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress_percentage < 30 AND completed_tasks > 5
SELECT user_id, completed_tasks, total_time_spent FROM user_progress WHERE session_id = 456 ORDER BY completed_tasks, total_time_spent DESC
SELECT * FROM UserProgress
SELECT user_id, level_completed FROM UserProgress WHERE level_completed > 5
SELECT user_id, time_spent FROM UserProgress ORDER BY time_spent DESC
SELECT accuracy, score FROM PerformanceMetrics
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.9 AND score > 100
SELECT user_id, level_completed, time_spent FROM UserProgress WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, accuracy, score FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, level_completed, time_spent FROM UserProgress ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, accuracy, score FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE user_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT user_id, level_completed, time_spent FROM UserProgress INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON UserProgress.user_id = PerformanceMetrics.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE username = 'Alice';
SELECT progress_id, user_id, completed_modules, total_modules FROM progress WHERE completed_modules > 5;
SELECT metric_id, user_id, accuracy, completion_time FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY accuracy DESC, completion_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users
SELECT user_id, registration_date, total_modules FROM progress ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT username, email, accuracy FROM users JOIN performance_metrics USING(user_id)
SELECT user_id, username, accuracy, completion_time FROM users INNER JOIN performance_metrics ON users.user_id = performance_metrics.user_id
SELECT u.username, p.total_modules, pm.accuracy FROM users u JOIN progress p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN performance_metrics pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id WHERE p.total_modules > 10
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, age FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, age, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT session_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM metrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT level_name, required_score FROM levels WHERE difficulty_level > 2;
SELECT user_id, performance_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE date_measured = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_progress WHERE progress_status = 'completed' ORDER BY date_completed DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE user_id = 3 AND achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, AVG(performance_value) AS avg_performance FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY user_id HAVING AVG(performance_value) > 80;
